wikipedia_page.main: Steven "Steve" Kynman (born 12 November 1975) is an English actor, writer and puppeteer, best known for voicing various characters (including the title character) in Fireman Sam, Bob the Builder and Thomas and Friends. He has starred in various shows for CBeebies and has worked as a puppeteer for The Jim Henson Company.

link_mentions.page: List of Thomas & Friends film characters
response: * Dart (voiced by Rupert Degas, now Steve Kynman in the UK and US) is a yellow-and-maroon diesel engine.
* Paxton (voiced by Steve Kynman in the UK and US) is a dark-green diesel engine who is friends with the steam engines.
